body:
Use go install to cache compiled packages for future reuse.

On Thu, 18 Feb 2016, 23:55 Mikkel Oscar Lyderik <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> I noticed huge increase in build time going from go 1.5.3 to 1.6
>
> I'm on Archlinux x86_64, using the go package
> <https://www.archlinux.org/packages/community/x86_64/go/> provided by
> Archlinux.
>
> Here is a project where I see huge increase in build time:
> https://github.com/mikkeloscar/maze/tree/f21b53cad5624744b49bbb3ab280a3eebf2d2376
>
> Build time with go 1.5.3:
>
> $ go version
> go version go1.5.3 linux/amd64
> $ time go build -vgithub.com/drone/drone/shared/servergithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/modelgithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/common/pkgconfiggithub.com/mikkeloscar/gopkgbuildgithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/common/utilgithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/remote/githubgithub.com/mikkeloscar/aurgithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/storegithub.com/drone/drone/shared/cryptogithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/store/datastoregithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/remotegithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/repogithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/router/middleware/contextgithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/sourcegithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/router/middleware/sessiongithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/source/aurgithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/checkergithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/controllergithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/routergithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze
> go build -v  4.27s user 0.25s system 160% cpu 2.816 total
>
> Build time with go 1.6:
>
> $ go version
> go version go1.6 linux/amd64
> $ time go build -vgithub.com/Sirupsen/logrusgithub.com/drone/drone/shared/envconfiggithub.com/drone/drone/vendor/github.com/Sirupsen/logrusgithub.com/golang/protobuf/protogopkg.in/go-playground/validator.v8github.com/drone/drone/shared/servergithub.com/gin-gonic/gin/rendergithub.com/manucorporat/ssegolang.org/x/net/contextgithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/modelgopkg.in/yaml.v2github.com/drone/drone/shared/httputilgithub.com/google/go-querystring/querygithub.com/google/go-github/githubgithub.com/gorilla/securecookiegithub.com/gin-gonic/gin/bindinggolang.org/x/oauth2/internalgithub.com/gin-gonic/gingolang.org/x/oauth2github.com/mikkeloscar/maze/common/pkgconfiggithub.com/mikkeloscar/gopkgbuildgithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/common/utilgithub.com/mikkeloscar/aurgithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/storegithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/repogithub.com/drone/drone/vendor/code.google.com/p/go.crypto/sshgithub.com/drone/drone/vendor/github.com/square/go-jose/ciphergithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/remote/githubgithub.com/drone/drone/vendor/github.com/square/go-josegithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/sourcegithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/source/aurgithub.com/drone/drone/vendor/github.com/dgrijalva/jwt-gogithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/remotegithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/checkergithub.com/drone/drone/shared/tokengithub.com/satori/go.uuidgithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/router/middleware/sessiongithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/router/middleware/contextgithub.com/mattn/go-sqlite3github.com/rubenv/sql-migrate/sqlparsegopkg.in/gorp.v1github.com/russross/meddlergithub.com/drone/drone/shared/cryptogithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/controllergithub.com/rubenv/sql-migrategithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/routergithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze/store/datastoregithub.com/mikkeloscar/maze
> go build -v  32.38s user 0.76s system 131% cpu 25.262 total
>
> It looks like go 1.6 is visiting a lot more packages, but I guess that's
> just the output that has changed.
> I suspect it's related to the blank import here
> <https://github.com/mikkeloscar/maze/blob/f21b53cad5624744b49bbb3ab280a3eebf2d2376/store/datastore/store.go#L10>
> since go build -v seems to stay on
> github.com/mikkeloscar/maze/store/datastore for a long time.
>
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/14380>.
>
